actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to require that, insofar as applicable, the House rules which apply to standing committees shall also apply to any select, special or ad hoc committee, commission or other entity established by the House.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that, insofar as applicable, the House rules which apply to standing committees shall also apply to any select, special, or ad hoc committee, commission, or other entity established by the House.

titles.title: Resolution to require that, insofar as applicable, the House rules which apply to standing committees shall also apply to any select, special or ad hoc committee, commission or other entity established by the House.
